resourceTemplates.name: app-insights-action-dimensions
resourceTemplates.title: App Insights - action (dimensions)
resourceTemplates.description: Returns all traces for action={action} and dimensions {dimension1}, {dimension2}.

resourceTemplates.name: app-insights-recent-requests
resourceTemplates.title: App Insights - recent requests
resourceTemplates.description: Toont de laatste requests met timestamp, naam, url, duur en HTTP code.

resourceTemplates.name: app-insights-recent-exceptions
resourceTemplates.title: App Insights - recent exceptions
resourceTemplates.description: Toont alle recente exceptions met timestamp, type en foutmelding.

resourceTemplates.name: app-insights-exception-count-by-type-7d
resourceTemplates.title: App Insights - exception count by type (7d)
resourceTemplates.description: Returns the number of exceptions by type for the last 7 days.

resourceTemplates.name: app-insights-requests-by-response-code-7d
resourceTemplates.title: App Insights - requests by response code (7d)
resourceTemplates.description: Returns count of requests by HTTP response code for the last 7 days.

resourceTemplates.name: app-insights-slowest-requests-7d
resourceTemplates.title: App Insights - slowest requests (7d, >1s)
resourceTemplates.description: Returns the slowest requests over 1 second in the last 7 days.

resourceTemplates.name: app-insights-most-called-actions
resourceTemplates.title: App Insights - most called actions
resourceTemplates.description: Aantal traces per Action (met dynamic-cast fix).
